title: Chrome Garden Tiger  Deconstructed Polo Tee
theme: Retro-futurist Y2K meets nature-as-geometry with DIY deconstruction and street-layering illusions
style: Oversized, boxy silhouette with deconstructed patchwork illusion; Y2K chrome accents; botanical filigree fused with vector wireframes; DIY visible seams
colorScheme: Pastel pistachio base with sky blue, washed pink, lemon, and coral accents; silver-chrome highlights; neon-lime topstitch notes; small black microtype
designElements: Front centerpiece: a faceted tiger mask built from delicate floral filigree and zebra-striping tessellations, edged in soft Y2K chrome. Surrounding UI: glowing HUD frames, cursor arrows, and wireframe orbs. Layering illusion: trompe-l'oeil denim-halftone patches with printed zigzag seams, raw-edge shadows, and cut-line annotations. Collar twist: a detachable-looking mini polo collar in pastel sky blue (can be real knit or a printed trompe-l'oeil). Reflective arcs along shoulder lines; sleeve micro-badge with QR-style glyph. Back print: exploded sewing-pattern schematic with botanical constellations and micro coordinates.
mood: Playfully subversive, tech-organic, collectible DIY elegance
aiPrompt: Front view of an oversized deconstructed streetwear T-shirt on a clean neutral background. Base: pastel pistachio cotton jersey. Add a detachable-looking pastel sky blue mini polo collar (pique texture) with subtle snap details. Center graphic: a geometric tiger mask constructed from delicate floral filigree and zebra stripes arranged into polygon facets; outlines rendered with subtle Y2K chrome gradients. Surround with soft-glow HUD frames, cursor arrows, and wireframe orbs. Layer trompe-l'oeil denim-halftone patch panels with printed zigzag topstitch and raw-edge shadows, plus small cut-line annotations. Add reflective silver accents tracing shoulder arcs. Include a tiny sleeve badge with a QR-style glyph. Show a small inset of the back print: exploded sewing pattern lines, coordinates, and floral constellations. Palette: pistachio, sky blue, washed pink, lemon, coral, silver chrome, black microtype. Style: clean vector screenprint, 300 dpi, high detail, fashion product lighting, slight shadow, no branding.
